lines: these tapes can be applied by hand or with a dispenser

our 3m removable repositionable tape 9415pc is a double coated tape that works on a variety of substrates or materials for temporary mounting of lightweight materials such as paper, plastics, films or foams
this double coated tape is composed of medium-tack, permanent adhesive on one side and low tack adhesive on the other with a resilient polyester film carrier in between.

remove, reposition, repeatonce 3m removable repositionable double coated tape 9415pc is laid down using the permanent adhesive side, the tape is ready for applications where lightweight items need to be repositioned, or removed and replaced repeatedly
